title: Vintage Red - Antique Wedding Power Hour Mega Mix
description:
The Antique Wedding Power Hour Mega Mix presented by Vintage Red
Released: October 5, 2013
Length: 58:11

Tracklist
1) Armin van Buuren ft. Laura Jansen - Sound of The Drums (Intro Edit)
2) Krewella - Alive (Cash Cash vs. DJ Kalkutta Remix)
3) Anakyn vs. Zedd - Blank Spectrum (ArtyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Flyaokon Remix Mashup by Vintage Red)
4) Alesso and Matthew Koma - Years (Vocal Extended Mix)
5) Calvin Harris - Feel So Close (Extended Mix)
6) Bingo Players - Cry (Just A Little)
7) Coldplay - Paradise (Fedde Le Grand Remix)
8) Mat Zo and Arty vs. Justice - We Are MozartÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Friends (SHato and Paul Rockseek Mashup)
9) Axwell, Ivan Gough, and Feenixpawl ft. Georgi Kay - In My Mind
10) Skrillex ft. Penny - All I Ask of You (Original Mix)
11) Zedd ft. Foxes vs. Porter Robinson - Clear Language (Area 6 Mashup)
12) Calvin Harris ft. Florence Welch - Sweet Nothing (Extended Mix)
13) Cash Cash ft. Bebe Rexha - Take Me Home (Original Mix)
14) Swedish House Mafia vs. Avicii ft. Aloe Blacc vs. Porter Robinson and Mat Zo - Don't You Wake Me Up Easy (Trilane Mashup and Vintage RedÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬ËœEasyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Edit)
15) Topher Jones and Amada ft. Ido vs. The World - Hello Chicago (Original Mix)
16) Calvin Harris ft. Ellie Goulding - I Need Your Love
17) Empire of The Sun - Alive (Zedd Remix)
18) Martin Solveig ft. Dragonette - Hello (Original Mix)
19) Arty ft. Chris James - Together We Are (Audien Remix)
20) Chicane - Hiding All The Stars
21) Armin van Buuren ft. Trevor Guthrie - This Is What It Feels Like (Extended Mix)
22) Above and Beyond - Small Moments

The mix is composed of 22 songs over the course of an hour long play time. Each song averages to be around two and a half minutes long all while mixing in other tracks at the same time. The entire mix is kept at 128bpm (beats per minute) and took over 400 hours to produce from start to finish. Many songs did not make the final cut for reasons including; simply not the right sound, too long and unable to cut shorter, or simply didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t give me a good gut feeling with the final tone of the mix. Everything is directly manipulated from a neighboring song either at the beginning or the end. MixMeister Fusion was the only application used in creating this mix.

I created this mix for my Wedding on October 5th, 2013. I hope you guys enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it!
